Enum.name: BLOCK
Enum.description: One trigger required for each block transfer

Enum.name: BURST
Enum.description: One trigger required for each burst transfer

Enum.name: TRANSACTION
Enum.description: One trigger required for each transaction

Enum.name: 1BEAT
Enum.description: Destination write starts after each beat source address read

Enum.name: 2BEATS
Enum.description: Destination write starts after 2-beats source address read

Enum.name: 4BEATS
Enum.description: Destination write starts after 4-beats source address read

Enum.name: 8BEATS
Enum.description: Destination write starts after 8-beats source address read

Enum.name: DEFAULT
Enum.description: Block event output selection. Refer to BTCTRL.EVOSEL for available selections.

Register.description: Channel n Interrupt Flag Status and Clear

Enum.name: EMPTY
Enum.description: Trigger rises when DCC is empty

Enum.description: Trigger rises when DCC is full

BitField.name: JEPIDCL
BitField.description: Low part of the JEP-106 Identity Code

Enum.name: SYNC
Enum.description: Edge detection is clock synchronously operated

Enum.name: ASYNC
Enum.description: Edge detection is clock asynchronously operated

Register.name: EIC_NMIFLAG
Register.description: Non-Maskable Interrupt Flag Status and Clear

Enum.name: SYNC
Enum.description: Edge detection is clock synchronously operated

Enum.name: ASYNC
Enum.description: Edge detection is clock asynchronously operated

Enum.name: NO_EVT_OUTPUT
Enum.description: No event output when using the resynchronized or synchronous path

Enum.name: RISING_EDGE
Enum.description: Event detection only on the rising edge of the signal from the event generator when using the resynchronized or synchronous path

Enum.name: FALLING_EDGE
Enum.description: Event detection only on the falling edge of the signal from the event generator when using the resynchronized or synchronous path

Enum.name: BOTH_EDGES
Enum.description: Event detection on rising and falling edges of the signal from the event generator when using the resynchronized or synchronous path
